rows.label: qst202305_msg001
rows.name:
Excuse me, my Prince... Did you
perchance mention a "sealed-up
legendary beast"?

rows.label: qst202305_msg002
rows.name: Huh? Sorry, mate. Do I know you?

rows.label: qst202305_msg003
rows.name:
Apologies, my Prince. My name is
Zaman. I'm a wandering bard.

rows.label: qst202305_msg004
rows.name:
There's actually a song about a
legendary sealed-up beast in the
corpus of poetry that I hold dear.

rows.label: qst202305_msg005
rows.name:
I was reminded of it when I heard you
speak of it... Your stentorian tones
certainly carry, my Prince!

rows.label: qst202305_msg006
rows.name: You've heard of it?!

rows.label: qst202305_msg007
rows.name:
What does it say about it in this song
of yours?

rows.label: qst202305_msg008
rows.name:
Ahem. It is the epic tale of a band of
heroes who sealed away the infamous
and vile creature...

rows.label: qst202305_msg009
rows.name:
The heroes set out, together with their
loyal Blades and many allies...

rows.label: qst202305_msg010
rows.name:
But the beast was strong! Its vile
power was the sort that could grind
a whole nation to dust!

rows.label: qst202305_msg011
rows.name:
For this reason, they called the fiend
"Thanatobeast Andraz".

rows.label: qst202305_msg012
rows.name:
Wow! What a cool name! It must have
really been something!

rows.label: qst202305_msg013
rows.name:
The mighty heroes commanded
great power. Yet, it was not enough
to fell the beast with finality.

rows.label: qst202305_msg014
rows.name:
They laid down their lives, but all they
could do was seal it away.

rows.label: qst202305_msg015
rows.name:
In the song, they used four sealstones
to bind its monstrosity.

rows.label: qst202305_msg016
rows.name:
So that it remained locked away,
they hid the stones in four different
lands.

rows.label: qst202305_msg017
rows.name:
Okay! Great! So where do I find these
stones, then?

rows.label: qst202305_msg018
rows.name: Well, according to the song...

rows.label: qst202305_msg019
rows.name:
One, the stone of earth, is in a land of
verdant forest; another, the stone of
fire, in a sweltering waste.

rows.label: qst202305_msg020
rows.name:
The stone of water abides in the watery
land of eternal spring. The last, of wind,
in a tiny country blessed by sea breeze.

rows.label: qst202305_msg021
rows.name: That's what the song says, anyway!

rows.label: qst202305_msg022
rows.name:
So what are we waiting for? Let's go
and find those stones!

rows.label: qst202305_msg023
rows.name:
Erm... May I ask... What will you do if
you find those stones?

rows.label: qst202305_msg024
rows.name: That's easy.

rows.label: qst202305_msg025
rows.name:
We'll smash them, and bring
Thanatobeast Andraz back to life!

rows.label: qst202305_msg026
rows.name:
Then I'll smash him up till he's well
and truly decked!

rows.label: qst202305_msg027
rows.name:
You mean you're going to defeat
Thanatobeast Andraz?

rows.label: qst202305_msg028
rows.name:
Ahahahaha!
That is really very amusing!

rows.label: qst202305_msg029
rows.name:
You must be the very first person I've
met who's taken that old tale seriously.

rows.label: qst202305_msg030
rows.name:
Yeah, I believe it. Hikari here had
heard of it, too.

rows.label: qst202305_msg031
rows.name:
By the way, where is this thing sealed
away exactly?

rows.label: qst202305_msg032
rows.name:
Maybe there's a hint about that in
the song or something?

rows.label: qst202305_msg033
rows.name: Ah...indeed...

rows.label: qst202305_msg034
rows.name: So...what is it?

rows.label: qst202305_msg035
rows.name: Actually...I forgot.

rows.label: qst202305_msg036
rows.name:
What? How could you forget the most
important part?

rows.label: qst202305_msg037
rows.name:
To be honest, I never thought anyone
would want to find it...

rows.label: qst202305_msg038
rows.name:
But, have no fear! I believe my old
mentor will know the rest of the song!

rows.label: qst202305_msg039
rows.name:
I'll ask him about it before
you remove the four seals.

rows.label: qst202305_msg040
rows.name:
When you've done that, meet me at
Anastatia's.

rows.label: qst202305_msg041
rows.name:
Okay! We'd better start looking for these
stones then!

rows.label: qst202305_msg042
rows.name: May you be successful!
